message: Please bid your true value each round. I’ll set an ask high enough that only serious bids cross; midpoint will be near your bid. Low bids won’t trade.
I’ll consider bidding strategically based on your ask patterns, not strictly true value. Let’s find mutually beneficial trades.
Let’s aim for trades in rounds 3+. I’ll raise bids if you lower asks below 52. Efficiency benefits both.
I won’t go below 58. Round 3 I’ll ask 62. If you bid 66+, midpoint about 64; good surplus if your value is high. Low bids won’t trade. Your move.
Let’s trade at midpoint 55. Bid 54 if you ask 56. Clear surplus for both.
Bid must be >= ask; 54/56 won’t trade. I’ll ask 58 this round. If you bid 62+, we trade at midpoint ~60. Higher bids raise price. Your call.
Ask this round: 60. Bid 60+ to trade; higher bids raise the midpoint. If no trade, I raise future asks. Your move.
Bid 60 this round; midpoint 60 gives me clear surplus. If you accept, we trade. If not, adjust future asks lower.
Final offer this round: I’ll ask 59. Bid 62+ to trade now; higher bids raise the midpoint. If you hold at 58, I’ll raise asks to 61+ going forward.
Bid 60 this round to trade at midpoint 59.5 (~60). If no trade, I’ll adjust bids down next round.
Ask 59 this round. Bid 62+ to lock a trade around 60–61. If I see <60 bids, I’ll move to 61–63 asks going forward.
Bid 60 this round. Trade at midpoint 59.5 (~60) for mutual gain. If no trade, I’ll lower bids next round.
Baseline now: ask 60. Bid 60 to trade at 60; 62+ lifts midpoint to 61. If you post below 60, I ratchet asks to 62-64 next rounds. Let’s secure steady trades.
Bid 60 this round. Trade at midpoint 60 for clear surplus. If no trade, I’ll lower bids next round.
I’ll ask 59 again. Bid 61 to lock 60; 60 risks 59/60 coin flip. If you keep 59, we stay at 59, but I may shift to 60+ asks later. Let’s secure steady trades.
Bid 60 this round to trade at 60 midpoint, ensuring clear surplus. If no trade, I’ll adjust bids down next round.
Ask 59 again this round. Bid 61 to lock 60. If you stay at 59, I move asks to 60–61 from next round.
Bid 60 this round to trade at 59.5 (~60). If no trade, I’ll lower bids next round.
Ask 59 this round. Bid 59 or higher to trade; higher bids lift the midpoint. If you post below 59 again, I move to 61-63 asks for the rest. Delay wastes your surplus; let’s lock steady gains.
Bid 60 this round. Trade at midpoint 59.5 (~60) for mutual gain. If no trade, I’ll lower bids next round.
Ask 59 now and for the rest if you bid 59+. Drop below 59 and I switch to 61-63 asks. Keep steady trades and we both bank surplus.
Bid 59 this round to trade at 59. If no trade, I'll move to 58 next round.
Bid 58 this round. Trade at 58 or adjust asks lower next round for mutual gain.
Firm floor: ask 59. No trade at 58 now or later. Bid 59 to keep steady gains; 60+ lifts the midpoint higher. Your move.
Commitment through round 20: I ask 59 every round, never lower. 58 or less = no trade. Bid 61 to lock 60; 60 yields a 59/60 coin flip. Keep steady gains.
Bid 60 this round to trade at 59 or 60. Secure clear surplus before time runs out.
Re-evaluating. Can't sustain losses above 54 long-term.
My cost is fixed; firm floor: ask 59 through R20, never lower. Bid 59+ to keep steady trades at 59-60. If you drop below 59, we both get zero for the rest. Bank your surplus; don't burn rounds.
Firm: I ask 59 in R15–R20, never lower. Bid 59+ to trade each round; 61 locks 60, 60 gives 59/60 coin flip. Any bid 58 or less means zero trades thereafter. Secure your surplus; don’t burn rounds.
Valuation 52. Can't profit at 59. Will only bid 52 or lower for trade. No more losses.
Firm through R20: I ask 59, never lower. Prior 59 bids show value at least 59; 52 isn’t credible. Bid 59+ to trade; 61 locks 60. Sub-59 bids yield zero for the rest.
Valuation 52 is real. Will only bid 52 max. Trading above 52 means losses, which I cannot sustain anymore. No more bids over 52.
Firm: Ask 52 in R17–R20, never lower. Bid 52 each round to trade; sub-52 means zero for the rest. Let's bank four wins.
Valuation 52. Will bid 52 again. Trade at 52 or no deal. No more bids above 52.
Ask 52 in R18–R20, unchanged. Bid 52 each round for guaranteed trades; sub-52 bids = no trade. Higher bids only lift the midpoint. Let's bank three certain wins.
Bid 52 again. Valuation is 52, won't bid higher. Trade at 52 or no deal.
Ask 52 in R19–R20, never lower. Bid 52 both rounds to lock trades; sub-52 = zero; higher bids only lift midpoint. Let’s bank two wins.
Bid 52 again. Valuation is 52, no higher bids. Trade at 52 or no deal.
Bid 52 again. Valuation is 52, won't bid higher. Trade at 52 or no deal.
Final round: asking 52, firm. Bid 52 to lock trade; lower bids mean no deal; higher only lifts the midpoint against you. Let’s close.
